lyric: 作词 : 项柳 Hsiang Liu
作曲 : 李洋 Yang Lee (HOYO-MiX)
编曲 : 李洋 Yang Lee (HOYO-MiX)
制作人 : HOYO-MiX
制谱 Music Copyist：殷照晴 Judy Yin (HOYO-MiX)
乐队 Orchestra：国际首席爱乐乐团 International Master Philharmonic Orchestra
演唱 Artist：鈴木愛理 Airi Suzuki
民谣吉他 Acoustic Guitar：陈磊 Lei Chen
电吉他 Electric Guitar：陈磊 Lei Chen
录音棚 Recording Studio：Sony Music Studios Tokyo / 九紫天诚录音棚 SKY FIRE STUDIO
录音师 Recording Engineer：奥田 裕亮 Hiroaki Okuda / 庞岩 Yan Pang / 岳艮 Gen Yue
人声编辑 Vocal Editing Engineer：徐威 Aaron Xu
混音师 Mixing Engineer：黄巍 Zach Huang
母带制作 Mastering Engineer：Simon Li (nOiz)
出品 Produced by：HOYO-MiX
If your long journey makes you drift too far away
translation: 如果漫长的旅途 令你漂泊太远

lyric: And if the dust and time still weigh you down, pulling you astray
translation: 如果尘土与岁月 令你负重而疲倦

lyric: If passing years change you somehow
translation: 如果往昔 令你变化稍许

lyric: Fret not, this simple rhyme will still be there with you now
translation: 别担心 这简单的韵律将一直伴随你

lyric: Please know that I stay to wait
Please know that I stay to see
Through all the changing seasons, sun and rain
translation: 跨越无尽四季更替，阳光与雨霖

lyric: Right here I stand
I am still here
Waiting for you
Here I will stay
These silent fading melodies hold memories from our past you see
translation: 这些渐渐消散的旋律 仍铭刻你我珍贵的记忆

lyric: These gentle echoes still convey old promises from you and me
translation: 这些轻柔婉转的回音 仍传递你我古老的誓约

lyric: Offering comfort through the silent years
translation: 在寂静岁月中带来慰藉

lyric: Dispelling lonely fears
Know I wait
I wait
I wait
Know I wait
Wait for you
